title: Alpha Sydney RP Give-away

embed.description: Retweet, favourite and follow to have a chance at winning $50 worth of Riot Points! Giveaway ends 19/11/15! pic.twitter.com/sQO25hKMrZ

body: If you want a chance at a **$50 Riot Point** give-away make sure to like and re-tweet our post. The winner will be selected randomly through the list. Thank you all and good luck!

replies.body: ill believe you if you gift me $25 rp in next 48 hours

As we are trying to promote a trustworthy and respectable oceanic organisation here at Alpha Sydney, I can understand your curiosity as to the legitimacy of the give-away but rest assure that anyone that does retweet and like the post has an equal chance for the $50 RP and once we do the random draw, we will gift the prize straight to the winner on their profile on LoL.
how so, that would first require adding the winner then waiting a day

Although I am glad that you are concerned about the overall well being of the personnel at Alpha Sydney, it has little to nothing to do at all with the give-away. Good luck though if you decide to enter.
Did that comment make you feel better inside?
